Second album Bloom is a continuation of what she began with Beloved One ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ it is a collection of tracks which, set free from the constrictions of electronic production, possess a startling power in their often unsettling honesty.

An obvious single, while emotive and passionate, it is a far cry from the rawness of emotion we experience in "Never Loved A Man (Like You)".
